mapper.select: select office_id,name, office_name from t_review_project where person_id = #{personId} and is_pass = 2 and del_flag = 0 and id not in (select group_item_id from t_depart_result where person_id = #{personId}) and id not in (select order_group_item_id from relation_person_project_check where person_id = #{personId} and state = 2)

SELECT t_review_project.id, t_review_project.person_id, t_review_project.person_name, t_review_project.name, t_review_project.short_name, t_review_project.order_num, t_review_project.office_id, t_review_project.office_name, t_review_project.unit_code, t_review_project.unit_name, t_review_project.default_value, t_review_project.result_type, t_review_project.in_conclusion, t_review_project.in_report, t_review_project.relation_code, t_review_project.group_order_id, t_review_project.del_flag, t_review_project.create_id, t_review_project.create_time, t_review_project.portfolio_project_id, t_review_project.group_id, t_review_project.test_num as projectCode, t_review_project.is_pass, t_review_project.address, t_review_project.sale_price, t_review_project.discount, t_review_project.discount_price, t_review_project.project_type, t_review_project.is_file, t_review_project.url, t_review_project.physical_type, t_review_project.service_type, t_review_project.reason, t_review_project.specimen , gp.sex , gp.age , gp.order_id , gp.test_num FROM t_review_project LEFT JOIN t_group_person gp ON gp.id = t_review_project.person_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT * FROM t_group_person WHERE id = (SELECT DISTINCT(person_id) FROM t_review_project WHERE id = #{id})

SELECT t_review_project.*, relation_person_project_check.state AS status FROM t_review_project LEFT JOIN relation_person_project_check ON order_group_item_id = t_review_project.id and relation_person_project_check.person_id = t_review_project.person_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t_review_project.office_id, t_review_project.NAME, t_review_project.office_name, relation_person_project_check.abandon_renson FROM t_review_project LEFT JOIN relation_person_project_check ON relation_person_project_check.order_group_item_id = t_review_project.id and relation_person_project_check.person_id = #{personId} AND state = 2 WHERE t_review_project.group_id = #{groupId} AND t_review_project.del_flag = 0 AND t_review_project.id IN ( SELECT order_group_item_id FROM relation_person_project_check WHERE relation_person_project_check.person_id = #{personId} AND state = 2 )

SELECT t_group_person.test_num, t_group_person.person_name, t_group_person.is_recheck, t_group_person.sex, t_group_person.age, t_group_person.id_card, t_group_person.hazard_factors_text, t_group_person.work_type_text, t_group_person.work_name, t_group_person.exposure_work_year, t_group_person.exposure_work_month, t_group_person.work_state_text, t_group_person.regist_date, t_group_person.check_result, t_group_person.physical_type, t_group_person.mobile, t_group_person.review_statu, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t_review_project.reason) As reason, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t_depart_result.diagnose_sum) AS diagnose_tip, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT REPLACE(t_review_project.portfolio_project_name,'(å¤)','')) AS portfolio_project_name FROM t_review_project LEFT JOIN t_group_person ON t_review_project.person_id = t_group_person.id LEFT JOIN t_depart_result ON t_depart_result.person_id = t_group_person.id AND t_depart_result.is_recheck = 1 WHERE t_group_person.del_flag = 0 AND t_group_person.is_pass >= 2 AND t_group_person.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY t_review_project.person_id

SELECT t_group_person.test_num, t_group_person.person_name, t_group_person.is_recheck, t_group_person.sex, t_group_person.age, t_group_person.is_pass, t_group_person.id_card, t_group_person.hazard_factors_text, t_group_person.work_type_text, t_group_person.work_name, t_group_person.exposure_work_year, t_group_person.exposure_work_month, t_group_person.work_state_text, t_group_person.check_result, t_group_person.mobile, t_group_person.regist_date, t_group_person.physical_type, t_group_person.review_statu, t_inspection_record.review_result, concat_ws('',t_inspection_record.conclusion,t_inspection_record.other_check_abnormal_results) AS conclusion, concat_ws('',t_inspection_record.handle_opinion,t_inspection_record.career_illness_name) AS handle_opinion FROM t_group_person LEFT JOIN t_inspection_record ON t_inspection_record.person_id = t_group_person.id WHERE t_group_person.del_flag = 0 AND t_group_person.order_id = #{orderId}
